title: oklahomaguy
author: oklahomaguy
content: Purchased in Oct 2022Batch 4Future Bit BTC Miner with NodeThe WIFI on this is SHORT range ( same room ) Due to this I can not continue to use it as I do not have an ethernet cable in the room I need it to be in.I am in East Oklahoma ( can meet in West Arkansas too )Asking $725 Shipped or $700 Local Pick up.Cash - Check - BTC - Apple Pay AcceptedDrop me an email and Ill send my number for pics / general questions.

comments.author: Papillion
comments.body: do you have photos of the equipment that you are attempting to sell?

comments.author: jimjam123
comments.body: Do you have any additional hash-boards, or is it just the ode with the one hash-board?Thanks,
